plugin_info.plugin_description: Import a network saved as ESRI Shapefile into Hydra.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by Philipp Meier, philipp@diemeiers.ch (c) Copyright 2015, 2016 Eawag: Swiss Federal Institute of Aquatic Science and Technology For more information visit www.hydraplatform.org

arg.name: Links file
arg.help: The filename(s) of the links to be imported.

arg.name: Nodes file
arg.help: The filename(s) of the nodes to be imported. If no node file is specified, nodes are created automatically from the start and endpoints of links.

arg.name: Server URL
arg.help: URL of HydraPlatform server (defaults to value specified in the config file).

arg.name: Server user
arg.help: Username to log in to Hydra Platform server.

arg.name: Server password
arg.help: Password to log in to Hydra Platform server.
